issue.title: [C++] Allow reordering fields of a StructArray via casting
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-16112](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16112). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Follow-up to ARROW-15643 and possibly required for full handling of nested field refs in scanning. We may need to add a cast option to allow this since this can cause ambiguities.
